title: Prism of purpose
brief_description: Gabo Island - Artist Alexandra Lyall’s paintings of the Gabo Island lighthouse provide haunting visuals to her moving account of the role the lighthouse played in a tragic family history.This work uses digital technology cleverly to allow you to experience Alexandra’s paintings in a new way.
